entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
